main

Interface Key_H

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameRun, GameRun_F, Map, Monster, Ms, Npc, PointerKey, SMSSender

    public interface Key_H
    The Key_H interface defines a set of constants representing various key codes. These key codes can be used to identify specific keys on a keyboard or keypad.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Key code for the 'C' key.
